title: Among Trees Free
description:
Among Trees Download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
Among Trees is a colorful survival-themed sandbox set in a beautiful wild world. You have a small wooden house in the middle of a dense forest. You can equip it and even complete new rooms. Gradually, the game will open up additional game mechanics for you, which will allow you to cook, grow various plants and even create the necessary tools.
Before you is a colorful forest that is inhabited by many animals . Some of them can be friends with you, and some can easily make you dinner. Your task is not just to learn how to survive, but to make your existence as comfortable as possible. Empires of the Undergrowth

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270
